item.title: Ancient Sumerians
item.description: Historical West-Asian region situated roughly around today’s Iraq and parts of Iran, Syria, Kuwait, & Turkey. People slept on their rooftops, due to excessive heat Uruk (first large city in the Mesopotamia) Epic of Gilgamesh (Uruk King) https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Epic_of_Gilgamesh
item.content:
Historical West-Asian region situated roughly around today’s Iraq and parts of Iran, Syria, Kuwait, & Turkey.

  • People slept on their rooftops, due to excessive heat
  • Uruk (first large city in the Mesopotamia)
  • Epic of Gilgamesh (Uruk King)
  • https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Epic_of_Gilgamesh
